com.badlogic.gdx.graphics

Interface GL11

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GL10, GLCommon

    public interface GL11
extends GL10
    Interface wrapping all OpenGL ES 1.1 methods. This interface inherits all the methods from GL10. Note that this excludes all fixed point methods!
    Author:
    mzechner
